trans-unit.source: Represents a single relationship between an object and a member.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta una singola relazione tra un oggetto e un membro.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberRelationshipService> is used by a serializer to announce that one property is related to a property on another object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberRelationshipService>viene utilizzato da un serializzatore di annunciare che una proprietà è correlata a una proprietà su un altro oggetto.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberRelationshipService>

trans-unit.source: MemberRelationship represents a single relationship between an object and a member that <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberRelationshipService> uses in its interactions with a serializer.
trans-unit.target: MemberRelationship rappresenta una singola relazione tra un oggetto e un membro che <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberRelationshipService>Usa nelle proprie interazioni con un serializzatore.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberRelationshipService>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberRelationship"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberRelationship"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The object that owns `member`.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto proprietario `member`.

trans-unit.source: The member which is to be related to `owner`.
trans-unit.target: Il membro che deve essere correlato a `owner`.

trans-unit.source: owner or member is .
trans-unit.target: owneror member is .

trans-unit.source: Represents the empty member relationship.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta la relazione di membri vuoto.

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Questo campo è di sola lettura.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberRelationship> structure is empty if neither the owner nor the member is assigned.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberRelationship>struttura è vuota se il proprietario né il membro viene assegnato.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberRelationship>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether two <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberRelationship"></xref> instances are equal.
trans-unit.target: Determina se due <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberRelationship"> </xref> istanze sono uguali.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberRelationship"></xref> to compare with the current <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberRelationship"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberRelationship"> </xref> da confrontare con l'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberRelationship"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberRelationship"></xref> is equal to the current <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberRelationship"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberRelationship"> </xref> è uguale all'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberRelationship"> </xref>; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce il codice hash per questa istanza.

trans-unit.source: A hash code for the current <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberRelationship"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Codice hash per l'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberRelationship"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether this relationship is equal to the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberRelationship.Empty"></xref> relationship.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se è uguale a questa relazione la <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberRelationship.Empty"> </xref> relazione.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this relationship is equal to the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberRelationship.Empty"></xref> relationship; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se è uguale a questa relazione la <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberRelationship.Empty"> </xref> relazione; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the related member.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il membro correlato.

trans-unit.source: The member that is passed in to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberRelationship.%23ctor%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Il membro che viene passato per il <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberRelationship.%23ctor%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Tests whether two specified <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberRelationship"></xref> structures are equivalent.
trans-unit.target: Verifica se due specificate <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberRelationship"> </xref> strutture sono equivalenti.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberRelationship"></xref> structure that is to the left of the equality operator.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberRelationship"> </xref> struttura a sinistra dell'operatore di uguaglianza.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberRelationship"></xref> structure that is to the right of the equality operator.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberRelationship"> </xref> struttura a destra dell'operatore di uguaglianza.

trans-unit.source: This operator returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the two <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberRelationship"></xref> structures are equal; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Questo operatore restituisce <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> se i due <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberRelationship"> </xref> strutture sono uguali; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Tests whether two specified <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberRelationship"></xref> structures are different.
trans-unit.target: Verifica se due specificate <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberRelationship"> </xref> strutture sono diverse.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberRelationship"></xref> structure that is to the left of the inequality operator.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberRelationship"> </xref> struttura a sinistra dell'operatore di disuguaglianza.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberRelationship"></xref> structure that is to the right of the inequality operator.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberRelationship"> </xref> struttura a destra dell'operatore di disuguaglianza.

trans-unit.source: This operator returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the two <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberRelationship"></xref> structures are different; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Questo operatore restituisce <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> se i due <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberRelationship"> </xref> strutture sono diversi; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the owning object.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'oggetto proprietario.

trans-unit.source: The owning object that is passed in to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberRelationship.%23ctor%2A>.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto proprietario viene passato per il <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberRelationship.%23ctor%2A>.
